## Overview {#overview}

This is a shared repository to facilitate gathering resources useful for ongoing genomics work at across NMFS.

Currently, this consists of:

1. Links to relevant scripts and pipelines
2. Previous workshops and round-tables run by the NMFS bioinformaticians
3. Tutorials

You can find the [github repo here](https://github.com/nmfs-ost/Genomics_Resources)
